item.title: Play Parties
item.description:
Play Parties

Our parties are free to attend, and are run in a well-equipped dungeon fitted with a wide array of toys and furniture available for use. Parties occur every month, and are by invitation only. To get an invitation please see consult our vouching rules.

item.title: Workshops Workshops Workshops
item.description:
Workshops Workshops Workshops

BDSM for Beginners is a workshop series that runs regularly for our newer members to introduce play, fetishes, roles, communication, and safety. These workshops are open to all and we highly recommend them to anyone new to the community.

item.title: Vouching and Safety
item.description:
Vouching and Safety

Your safety is important to us and we work hard to educate about best practices and create safeguards. These include:

item.title: How do 'Munches' Work?
item.description:
How do 'Munches' Work?

Munches are fun, informal, social events for anyone interested in kink or BDSM. While we like to have a relaxed and easy-going atmosphere at our munches, we do have a few requests concerning etiquette.

item.title: Help! I'm New!
item.description:
Help! I'm New!

Don't worry, we were all new at some point. We have three suggestions for you...

item.title: Who are we?
item.description:
Who are we?

Kinky Hong Kong (KHK) is Hong Kong's flagship kink group. Created by a group of Hong Kong's most experienced members, KHK exists to serve the community through education, safety, and great events. We are not-for-profit and rely on volunteers who donate their time, equipment, and venues.
